data.title: Databutton - The AI developer for non-techies
data.description: Your hunt for a CTO ends here. Team up with the world's first reasoning AI developer to build your SaaS product or radically transform how you operate your business.
data.content:
Databutton - The AI developer for non-techies
===============

We use essential cookies to make our site work. With your consent, we may also use non-essential cookies to improve user experience, personalize content, and analyze website traffic. For these reasons, we may share your site usage data with our analytics partners. By clicking ‚ÄúAccept,‚Äù you agree to our website's cookie use as described in our Cookie Policy. You can change your cookie settings at any time by clicking ‚ÄúPreferences.‚Äù

Your hunt for a CTO ends here. Team up with the world's first reasoning AI developer.

Our reasoning agent is the first to ever‚Ä¶
-----------------------------------------

### Learn and know about your app

Share your app brief as a vision, specs, and design inspiration to get started. Databutton has long term memory about your app and decisions made along the way.

What's the brief?

Share your app specs, mockups, and inspiration

üìÑspec.pdf

üé®mockup.jpg

üì±screenshot.png

### Create high level plans

Get an instant development plan, broken down into clear actionable tasks. The plan evolves as you continue giving feedback and have new ideas or needs.

###### DATABUTTONMARCH 9 2025 AT 06:09

Create a landing page

recommended

Build a landing page for the CRM in a bold, clean style

Implement sign in with Google

to do

Add secure login with Firebase

Build the pipeline view

to do

Create pipeline view using Airtable API

### Execute big tasks

Just hit "start task". The agent will think, research, code, and let you know when it needs input.

###### DATABUTTONMARCH 9 2025 AT 06:09

Implement sign in with Google

in progress

Add secure login with Firebase

Add config

### Take technical ownership

The agent handles deployment and makes tech decisions like which database or product analytics to use, but you can always override.

üöÄDeploy to Production

Stop commanding.  
Start collaborating.
---------------------------------------

Deploy to your own domain in seconds
------------------------------------

Deployment, including to your domain, is a breeze. The Databutton agent deploys your app to AWS and Google Cloud. Apps live on scalable infrastructure and have snappy load times.

[Get started](https://www.databutton.com/new)

Pricing
-------

Whether you're a non-technical founder building your SaaS product or an existing business radically transforming how you operate, we have you covered.  
  
Prices include the first seat. For additional seats and teams, [contact us](mailto:hi@databutton.io?subject=AdditionalDatabuttonseats).  
  
For pricing on hosting and deployment, check the FAQ section.

### Agent + Community

Team up with AI and pay for what you need

$20

per month

Perfect for non-techies looking to have apps built by AI

Unlimited apps

Plan and build with the agent

Discord community support

Weekly community office hours

[Get started for free](https://databutton.com/new)

### Agent + Human support

Unlimited use of AI with expert support

$700

per month

Ideal for businesses that want help with serious projects

Dedicated Slack channel for support

Human expert help unblocking your progres

### Agent + Human advisor

$4000

per month (and up)

Best for businesses looking for a tech partner

Human expert completes features in Databutton for you

Weekly sync meetings and collaboration

[Book a meeting](https://calendly.com/william-databutton/30min)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

#### What is the pricing for deployment and hosting?

Hosting ‚Äì we only charge for compute, i.e. actual usage for your app. Hosting your frontend is free. We charge 2 credits for each compute-hour on your app's backend when deployed ‚Äì i.e. when the backend of your application is triggered and does work). Deployment to custom domains is included on the $50/mo "Launch" plan and above.

#### How does deployment and hosting work?

We provide a 1-click deploy experience to \[username\].databutton.app/\[appname\]. We also support deployment to custom domains (available at the $50 "Launch" plan and higher). We provide this for convenience and ease of use. If you want to deploy on your infrastructure, you can reach out to us.

#### Do I need to bring my own model/LLM key(s) to use Databutton?

No, not to use the Databutton AI app developer! We're always evaluating the best models available for the agentic framework you interact with in Databutton and associated costs are covered in your Databutton credit usage.

#### What if I want to make an AI-driven app?

If you want to build an app utilising a model or service (e.g. GPT-4, ElevenLabs, etc.), you will either need to bring your own API key/secrets for use in your application or request an API key/secrets from your application‚Äôs users.

#### Who owns my app‚Äôs code and IP?

You own your code and IP. Databutton is a facilitator in realising your big idea; we do not have any claim to your IP. We host your code on our service in order to make it easy to iterate, deploy, and provide a more on-rails experience.
